text: Risk minimized by: e Careful positioning e Maintaining SCPP SCPP = MAP - CSFP CSFP can be reduced by CSF drainage MAP manipulated by anaesthetist Zkeep systolic blood pressure > 90 mmHg e Drugs Methylprednisolone given less than 8 hours after insult NMDA antagonists (ketamine. magnesium) e Prevention of hematoma formation Careful hemostasis Stop anti-platelet medication preoperatively Withhold heparin immediately postoperatively
